<p align="justify">
The user then chooses which environmental variables to use as predictors. These data are in raster form. For this demonstration, WorldClim bioclimatic variables are made available at 3 resolutions. 

Future versions will include other sets of environmental variables, as well as allow users to upload their own sets of environmental variables and designate a shapefile indicating a custom study region.
</p>
